ruleSearchList:
<js>
var key = decodeURI(baseUrl.replace(/^.*-(.*?)\_.*html/,"$1"));
var page = baseUrl.replace(/^.*\_(.*?)\.html/,"$1");
var list = new Array();
if (page<=1) {
  var title = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@tag.h3@text",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var author = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@class.author@text",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var cover  = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@tag.img@src",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var href = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@href",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  for (var i=0; i<title.length; i++) {
    list.push({title:title[i], author:author[i], cover:cover[i], href:href[i]});
  }
}
else {
  var json;
  if (baseUrl.indexOf("search")>0)
    json = JSON.parse(java.postForm("https://m.manmanapp.com/search/search-ajax.html","keyword="+key+"&page="+page));
  else
    json = JSON.parse(java.postForm("https://m.manmanapp.com/category/list-ajax.html","id="+key+"&page="+page));
  json.data.forEach(function(data){
    list.push({title:data.title,  author:data.author.nickname, cover:data.cover_image_url, href:"/comic-"+data.id+".html"});
  });
}
list
